name: This Is A Story - ALPHA
description:
"This is a story" focuses on the Narrator/Reader relationship, as well as cliches in modern writing as well as classical.   Poking fun at the expectations in storytelling, while simultaneously falling ironically into many of the tropes that one comes to expect from a twine game. 

The very basics of this game are presented,  just to see if anyone is interested in the style I've got going here.

If it seems that people like it, I'll  try to update it regularly.  

Alpha made in less than 24 hours.  Not for a game jam, but just because I was challenging myself with the time limit.

Not necessarily appropriate for children or the easily disturbed.
